title: Tucker: Male Shooter = Women’s Fault, Dumb Hadron Collider 07.07.22
itunes:title: Tucker: Male Shooter = Women’s Fault, Dumb Hadron Collider 07.07.22
description:
In episode 1282, Jack and guest co-host DJ Danl Goodman are joined by comic, actor, singer and co-host of The Boss Bitch Show, Rachel Green, to discuss... Similar Story With Mass Shooter In Illinois: Transparent Failure of Policing and Gun Control, Tucker Carlson’s History of Defending Mass Shooters, CERN’s Particle Accelerator Probably Didn’t Throw Us Into Another Dimension and more!

  1. Tucker Carlson’s History of Defending Mass Shooters
  2. The misogyny fueling America’s mass shootings
  3. Tucker Carlson’s sloppy effort to leverage the Highland Park shooting
  4. Fox News Tried to Blame Weed for the Uvalde Mass Shooting
  5. All the things Fox News blamed the Parkland shooting on other than the gun
  6. Tucker Carlson hits a dangerous new low in his response to the Buffalo shooting
  7. Tucker Carlson suggests teen charged in Kenosha protester killings had to 'maintain order when no one else would'
  8. Tucker Carlson’s claim that white supremacy is a “hoax” is false — but revealing
  9. CERN’s Particle Accelerator Probably Didn’t Throw Us Into Another Dimension
  10. New CERN Hadron Collider experiment sparks July 5 Doomsday conspiracies – what’s really going on
  11. Bizarre conspiracy swirls after Large Hadron Collider relaunches for first time in three years
  12. Debunking doomsday at CERN, again
  13. Physicists assure us that we’re not living in an alternate reality where Trump is president

LISTEN: Laputa feat. Anderson .Paak (Taylor McFerrin Remix) by Hiatus Kaiyote

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
